Design-01.Description: These are solid blackout stripes design.

Design-02.Description: These solid blackout stripes have an inner pinstripe (red in image) that can either be cutout or a complimenting color.

Design-03.Description: These blackouts are solid with a chevron accent pinstripe (red in image) on the front end of the stripe. This pinstripe can be either cutout or a 2nd color.

Design-04.Description: These blackouts are checkered (racing flag) themed and can either be one or two colors.
